title: Carmen Electra puts on a racy display in skintight catsuit as she attends Halloween costume party
text:
She first began her career as a singer before finding fame as an actress on the iconic drama series Baywatch.

And Carmen Electra looked nothing short of sensational as she donned a feline-inspired costume at the Fright Nights Halloween costume party at The Seminole Coconut Creek Casino in Coconut Creek, Florida on Thursday.

The glamour model, 47, donned a skintight animal print catsuit for the bash which she paired with dramatic matching make-up.

Event: Carmen Electra, 47, looked sensational as she at the Fright Nights Halloween costume party at The Seminole Coconut Creek Casino in Coconut Creek, Florida on Thursday

Carmen also sported black make-up on her nose which trailed down to her matching lipstick while she cinched her waist with a black corset.

The Scary Movie star added height to her frame with a pair of black boots while she also wore an edgy black headband with a spike embellishment.

Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Carmen ensured all eyes were on her on the red carpet as she struck a series of dramatic poses.

Carmen starred on Baywatch from 1997 to 1998 as Lani McKenzie, replacing Pamela Anderson who departed the show in '97.

Style: The glamour model donned a skintight animal print catsuit for the bash which she paired with dramatic matching make-up

Edgy: Carmen also sported black make-up on her nose which trailed down to her matching lipstick while she cinched her waist with a black corset

Costume: Carmen also displayed her eye-catching yellow nail polish as she posed up a storm on the red carpet

Outfit: The Scary Movie star added height to her frame with a pair of black boots while she also wore an edgy black headband with a spike embellishment

Star: Letting her blonde locks fall loose down her shoulders, Carmen ensured all eyes were on her on her as she struck a series of dramatic poses

In an interview with Access, the actress recalled her audition for the show, which came at a time when she had no acting experience.

She said: 'At the time I was with UTA [United Talent Agency] and they said: "Baywatch wants to interview you to be on the show. Pamela is leaving and they are hiring a new cast of women."

'I was so nervous. I had never acted in my life. I basically got the script and started. I walked into the audition and David Hasselhoff and everyone is sitting there.

'I'm jut standing, nervously smiling, trying to do the best I can. The next question, "will you go put this red swimsuit on?" I was in shock because at the time, I was shooting with MTV and I didn't shave my legs.

'I didn't know I was going to put on a bikini that day but I did it anyway. I went through with it. I have a good sense of humour about myself.'
description: The Baywatch star, 47, looked sensational at the Fright Nights Halloween costume party at The Seminole Coconut Creek Casino in Coconut Creek, Florida on Thursday.
